table.business-des: Rental scooter, visa and work permit proxy application, foreign currency exchange

founder.title: EMC founding story
founder.des-1: In late 2013, my brother Kubo, who worked for a motorcycle finance company in Phnom Penh, purchased six used motorcycles imported from Thailand by the recommendation of a colleague of the company, and forced his brother who was smoldering at his parents' house in Nara to Phnom Penh. Is the beginning of EMC.
founder.des-2: The younger Khmer college student, Heen, who just moved to Tokyo, is one of the starting members. Aozora office started just by renting a corner of an apartment in Bankenkon where I lived at that time and only placing a desk.
founder.des-3: Although it didn't ring for the first two months after the start of business, the good access to the center of BKK and the customer-centered customer service style spread as word-of-mouth among the resident Europeans and Americans, and gradually gained fans.
founder.des-4: Six months after the start of business, the office was moved to Street 322 of BKK1, which is the current store location. Later, he and his hometown best friend, Hack, who now works as a senior engineer, and IT system developer Pices, who underpins EMC's operations, will be the main EMC members supporting the current backbone of EMC.

step-1.title: Please have the following required documents at hand.

step-2.title: EMC shop
step-2.des-1: Please visit EMC and select the bike you want to contact.
step-2.des-2: If you have a desired car model in advance, please contact us.

step-3.title: Rental as it is
step-3.des-1: Please submit the required documents and pay after selecting the bike.
step-3.des-2: If there is no problem, you can ride a motorcycle and drive in Phnom Penh.
step-3.des-3: We also rent helmets for customers who wish.

visa.title: Visa service and work permit
visa.sub-title: Visa Renewal and Work Permit (Work Permit) Proxy Application Service

step-1.title: Please have the following required documents at hand.

step-2.title: EMC shop
step-2.des-1: Please visit EMC and select the bike you want to contact.
step-2.des-2: If you have a desired car model in advance, please contact us.

step-3.title: VISA/work permit renewal/creation
step-3.des-1: Once the update is complete, we will contact you via SMS, phone, etc.
step-3.des-2: Please wait until the update is completed.
step-3.des-3: If you are in a hurry, we also offer express services.

step-4.title: Acceptance
step-4.des-1: After sending the update/creation completion from EMC, you will receive it at the store.
step-4.des-2: If you wish, we also offer a service that will be sent after the update is completed.
